channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 市场动荡之际中国更换证监会主席
item.description: China has replaced the head of its securities regulator, the official Xinhua news agency said on Wednesday, as policymakers struggle to stabilise the country's main stock indexes after a plunge to five-year lows.翻译:官方新华社周三表示，中国已更换了证券监管机构负责人，因为政策制定者在跌至五年低点后努力稳定中国主要股指。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾因旅游业和航线争端而停止新的中国团体旅行
item.description: Taiwan's Tourism Administration on Wednesday told travel agents to stop organising new group tours to China since Beijing has yet to allow such trips to the island by Chinese tourists and has altered a flight path in the sensitive Taiwan Strait.翻译:台湾旅游局周三要求旅行社停止组织新的前往中国的团体旅游，因为北京尚未允许中国游客前往台湾旅游，并且已经改变了敏感的台湾海峡的飞行路线。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 德国总理肖尔茨将于四月访华-FAZ
item.description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz will travel to China from April 15-16, the FAZ newspaper reported on Wednesday, citing an invitation sent to business representatives by the Asia-Pacific Committee of German Business.翻译:德国《FAZ》报周三援引德国商业亚太委员会向企业代表发出的邀请报道称，德国总理奥拉夫·肖尔茨将于4月15日至16日访问中国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 瑞士外长希望中国能够在乌克兰和谈中“帮助我们”
item.description: Swiss Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis said on Wednesday he hoped China would "give us a hand" in Ukraine peace talks, after Switzerland last month agreed to host a global peace summit on Ukraine.翻译:瑞士外交部长伊格纳齐奥·卡西斯周三表示，在瑞士上个月同意主办乌克兰问题全球和平峰会后，他希望中国在乌克兰和平谈判中“帮助我们”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国新能源汽车销量自8月以来首次环比下降
item.description: China's new energy vehicle sales fell 38.8% versus the previous month, the first such drop since August 2023, industry data showed, as demand faltered in the world's largest auto market despite a renewed discounting push led by Tesla .翻译:行业数据显示，中国新能源汽车销量环比下降38.8%，这是自2023年8月以来的首次下降，尽管特斯拉引领新一轮打折促销，但全球最大汽车市场的需求仍出现下滑。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 香港迪士尼乐园过山车上十二人获救
item.description: Twelve people were rescued from a rollercoaster in Hong Kong's Disneyland after the ride stopped working on Wednesday afternoon, police and fire services said after they deployed dozens of personnel to the site.翻译:警方和消防部门在部署了数十名人员到现场后表示，周三下午香港迪士尼乐园的过山车停止运行后，有十二人从该过山车中被救出。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 路透调查：新兴市场货币短期内将稳步上涨
item.description: Most emerging market currencies will struggle to recoup this year's losses against the dollar in coming months as expectations for aggressive rate cuts from the U.S. Federal Reserve diminish, a Reuters poll of FX strategists found.翻译:路透对外汇策略师的一项调查发现，随着美联储大幅降息的预期减弱，大多数新兴市场货币兑美元汇率在未来几个月将难以收复今年的损失。
item.author: Devayani Sathyan, Vuyani Ndaba

item.title: 嘉士伯押注中国，昂贵的啤酒实现更高的增长目标
item.description: Shares in Carlsberg rose 5% on Wednesday as the market welcomed the Danish brewer's plans to reach its stepped-up growth ambitions through 2027, including higher spending in key countries such as China.翻译:嘉士伯股价周三上涨 5%，市场欢迎这家丹麦啤酒制造商计划到 2027 年实现其加速增长的目标，包括在中国等主要国家增加支出。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: IEA表示，到2030年，印度将成为全球最大的石油需求增长动力
item.description: India is expected to be the largest driver of global oil demand growth between 2023 and 2030, narrowly taking the lead from top importer China, the International Energy Agency (IEA) said on Wednesday.翻译:国际能源署(IEA)周三表示，预计印度将成为2023年至2030年全球石油需求增长的最大推动力，以微弱优势领先于最大进口国中国。
item.author: Sethuraman R, Nidhi Verma

item.title: 珠宝商潘多拉 (Pandora) 今年迄今销售额“健康”
item.description: Pandora , the world's biggest jewellery maker, said on Wednesday its performance since the start of the year has been "healthy" with high single-digit sales growth, as it announced a share buyback programme after a strong run.翻译:全球最大的珠宝制造商潘多拉 (Pandora) 周三表示，自今年年初以来，其业绩“健康”，销售额实现高个位数增长，并在强劲表现后宣布了股票回购计划。
item.author: Helen Reid

item.title: 菲律宾将加强在面向台湾的岛屿上的军事存在
item.description: The Philippines' defence chief has ordered the military to boost the number of troops stationed at the northernmost islands near Taiwan to fortify Manila's territorial defence capabilities.翻译:菲律宾国防部长已命令军方增加驻扎在台湾附近最北端岛屿的部队数量，以加强马尼拉的领土防御能力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在澳大利亚和新西兰以南设立南极站
item.description: China on Wednesday inaugurated its Ross Sea scientific research station, the official Xinhua news agency reported, starting operations in an outpost in a part of the Antarctic due south of Australia and New Zealand for the first time.翻译:据官方新华社报道，中国周三启用了罗斯海科考站，这是首次在澳大利亚和新西兰以南的南极部分地区的一个前哨站开始运营。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国视频应用抖音集团首席执行官辞职，在字节跳动担任新职务
item.description: TikTok owner ByteDance said on Wednesday that Zhang Nan has resigned as the CEO of Douyin Group, the popular short video platform's sister app in China, while assuming a new role to shepherd ByteDance's video editing app.翻译:TikTok 所有者字节跳动周三表示，张楠已辞去抖音集团首席执行官（该流行短视频平台在中国的姐妹应用程序）的首席执行官职务，同时担任新职务，负责管理字节跳动的视频编辑应用程序。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚将在马拉佩访问期间向澳大利亚保证安全关系
item.description: Papua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape will seek to assure Australia of close security and historical ties during a visit that began on Wednesday even as the Pacific nation boosts trade with China.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚总理詹姆斯·马拉佩将在周三开始的访问中寻求向澳大利亚保证密切的安全和历史联系，尽管这个太平洋国家正在促进与中国的贸易。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 早盘竞价：等待北京市场的实际行动
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北京呼吁韩国奉行“积极、客观、友好”的对华政策
item.description: China hopes South Korea will pursue a "positive, objective and friendly" policy towards Beijing, foreign minister Wang Yi said in a phone call with his South Korean counterpart on Tuesday.翻译:外交部长王毅周二在与韩国外长通电话时表示，中国希望韩国奉行“积极、客观、友好”的对华政策。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国间谍去年入侵了荷兰国防网络——情报机构
item.description: Chinese state-backed cyber spies gained access to a Dutch military network last year, Dutch intelligence agencies said on Tuesday, calling it part of a trend of Chinese political espionage against the Netherlands and its allies.翻译:荷兰情报机构周二表示，中国国家支持的网络间谍去年进入了荷兰军事网络，称这是中国针对荷兰及其盟国进行政治间谍活动的一部分。
item.author: James Pearson, Anthony Deutsch

item.title: 中国在北京会谈中向美国表达了对关税和制裁的担忧
item.description: China's financial officials expressed concerns to visiting U.S. Treasury officials about U.S. tariffs, investment restrictions and sanctions set up to "suppress" Chinese companies, the Chinese finance ministry said on Tuesday.翻译:中国财政部周二表示，中国金融官员向来访的美国财政部官员表达了对美国为“打压”中国企业而实施的关税、投资限制和制裁的担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于太阳能行业陷入危机，欧洲因中国进口陷入困境
item.description: Europe's green energy transition is stuck between a rock and a hard place. A flood of cheap Chinese solar panel imports is driving record solar energy installations. But those same imports are crushing Europe's few local solar manufacturers.翻译:欧洲的绿色能源转型陷入进退两难的境地。大量廉价的中国太阳能电池板进口正在推动太阳能安装量创历史新高。但同样的进口正在压垮欧洲为数不多的本地太阳能制造商。
item.author: Kate Abnett, Nina Chestney

item.title: 中国海警船进入东海争议海域
item.description: China's Coast Guard said it patrolled the waters of the Diaoyu Islands on Tuesday - territories in the East China Sea that are claimed by China, Japan and Taiwan.翻译:中国海警表示，周二在钓鱼岛海域进行了巡逻。钓鱼岛是中国、日本和台湾都声称拥有主权的东海领土。
item.author: Reuters
